column5: My place is close to Lackland AFB (BMT graduation), just 5 min! 20 min from downtown, 15 min to sea world, & near lots of shopping & restaurants to include a Wal-Mart Supercenter around the block. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the space to comfortably fit a large family, a fully equipped kitchen, homey feel, hotel perks, community pool/park, & quiet/peaceful neighborhood. My place is good for families with kids (especially in b/n PCS's), business travelers (TDY's), vacations, & big groups.
column8: Perfect BMT Graduation home to enjoy San Antonio!
